special_traits.name: Resourceful
special_traits.description: You gain Heroic Inspiration whenever you finish a Long Rest.

trait.name: Heroic Inspiration
trait.description: If you (a player character) have Heroic Inspiration, you can expend it to reroll any die immediately after rolling it, and you must use the new roll.

special_traits.name: Skillful
special_traits.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

special_traits.name: Versatile
special_traits.description: You gain an Origin feat of your choice
